price: TiRẹ̀ sì ni ohunkóhun tó wà nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀. TiRẹ̀ sì ni (àfọ̀mọ́) ẹ̀sìn títí láéláé¹ Nítorí náà, ṣé (n̄ǹkan mìíràn) yàtọ̀ sí Allāhu ni ẹ̀yin yóò máa bẹ̀rù ni?
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلدِّينُ وَاصِبًاۚ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ni pé, Allāhu nìkan ṣoso ni a gbọ́dọ̀ jọ́sìn fún ní ọ̀nà òdodo.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walahu al-dīnu wāṣiban afaghayra al-lahi tattaqūna
